content: beautiful solid and cozy texture is what you will find in this jayden beanie crochet pattern the second hat pattern in the wonderful hats crochet along this crochet hat is worked in a beautiful solid texture the stitches are worked closely together giving the stitches a puffed appearance the final hat is thick and warm the jayden beanie is worked from the brim up and all as one piece i have sized it here to fit an adult head with a 20-22 inch circumference and i will provide a little instruction later on for how you might adjust the size if needed this listing is for a crochet pattern only this crochet pattern is written in english only and uses american crochet terms a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this crochet pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 16 sts x 8 row of half_double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 9 x 9 inches laid flat yarn wool-ease® by lion brand® yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 197 yds/180 m 3oz/85 g 4 medium/worsted weight 1 5 balls of fisherman hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge optional pompom to attach to the top
